channel.title: Alt key?
channel.description: How would i go about having it push down the Left alt key and using another key, such as.. The number 1? Also, how do i specify the Center key(the 5 key on numpad, with numlock off) Doesnt seem im able to. Well, thanks for your time.

item.title: Alt key?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Oh wow check it out. It does work! Thanks Janilabo.

I was just about to say it didn’t work until I saw you had ActivateClient in there. I kept running the script and it wouldn’t print anything so I figured it didn’t work.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Alt key?
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

[quote=“KyleGut3, post:1, topic:2640”]######### Number Pad #########

0 - 96 1 - 97 2 - 98 3 - 99 4 - 100 5 - 101 6 - 102 7 - 103 8 - 104 9 - 105 Multiply - 106 Add - 107 Enter - 108 Subtract - 109 Decimal - 110 Divide - 111 [/quote]

Test with this… Worked for me at least. NumpadNumber can be 0-9. It will hold down alt and then hit the numpad number which you choose(d). This is just basic script to try it…

[scar]var
Number: Integer;

const
NumpadNumber = 1;

procedure Casing;
begin
case NumpadNumber of
0: Number := 96;
1: Number := 97;
2: Number := 98;
3: Number := 99;
4: Number := 100;
5: Number := 101;
6: Number := 102;
7: Number := 103;
8: Number := 104;
9: Number := 105;
end;
end;

begin
Casing;
ActivateClient;
KeyDown(18);
Wait(20 + Random(15));
KeyDown(Number);
Wait(20 + Random(15));
KeyUp(Number);
Wait(100 + Random(50));
KeyUp(18);
end.[/scar]

Just to know that, it IS possible to ‘send’ numpadkeys with SCAR.

Read full topic

item.title: Alt key?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[scar]
begin
SendKeysVB(’%’, true);
end.
[/scar]

item.title: Alt key?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

junior, he means the number 1 on the numpad. The reason behind that was because he wants to send crazy characters like… µ › and others. And the code you just gave will press alt and the number 1 on the left side of the keyboard, which is NOT the numpad. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Alt key?
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

this is for pressing down the alt key and number 1 at the same time.
[scar]KeyDown(18);
wait(150+random(50))
KeyDown(49);
KeyUp(49);
wait(50+random(50))
KeyUp(18);[/scar]

and this is the link for all the keycodes:
http://www.moparisthebest.org:55/smf/index.php/topic,2894.0.html
Enjoy
~jR

Read full topic

item.title: Alt key?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

This is how you press Alt in SCAR.

KeyDown(18);
KeyUp(18);

Oh and the numbes in the numpad can not be pressed/detected using scar to my knowledge.

Read full topic
